adHeader: wanted Christian caregiver possible live in FULL MED, EYE, DENTAL INC.
adDetails: Hello my name is Cynthia and I am looking for someone to be my campanion, caregiver, house cleaner and pick up after me. $12.20 an hr. 4 to 6 hrs daily 5 days week 144.45 HRS MO.Will be moving by Sept. I'm on Section 8. I need help packing, cleaning, cooking (only food a diabetic would eat, no fried anything). I talk loudly when excited and might yell if you talk to me if on phone. I'm sorry but I can't hear and talk at the same time, or do 2 things at once. I'm ADD and bipolar. Deaf and impaired hearing. Police background check needed. No drugs, drinking, smoking, swearing. Thank you
